aws_neptune_cluster_parameter_group.description: Manages a Neptune Cluster Parameter Group

name.description: The name of the neptune parameter.

name_prefix.description: Creates a unique name beginning with the specified prefix. Conflicts with `name`.

family.description: The family of the neptune cluster parameter group.

description.description: The description of the neptune cluster parameter group. Defaults to "Managed by Terraform".

parameter.description: A list of neptune parameters to apply.

tags.description: A mapping of tags to assign to the resource.

value.description: The value of the neptune parameter.

apply_method.description: Valid values are `immediate` and `pending-reboot`. Defaults to `pending-reboot`.

id.description: The neptune cluster parameter group name.

arn.description: The ARN of the neptune cluster parameter group.
